<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Brood Leech Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=712)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Most smaller species of leeches do not tend to swarm, but brood leeches are prone to gathering in seething, undulant mats of squirming gluttony. When they gather in sufficient numbers to swarm, they eschew the stealth of a lone leech's feeding methods in favor of swift and merciless feeding. In these situations, their mild venom can affect much larger creatures than their usual prey.

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Brood Leech Swarm Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and –5-foot status penalty to Speed (1 round); **Stage 2** clumsy 1, sickened 1, and –10-foot status penalty to Speed (1 round)
